item.title: Aes in CBC mode
item.description: AES-CBC | I still see penguins I think this was a very experimental exercise. edit: I did a dumb thing, hence this post exists. Scroll to the bottom to save yourself some pain. Task (cryptopals set2 challenge 11): Write an encryption oracle with encrypts a plaintext with AES in ECB mode half the time and CBC mode other half. Write a detection oractle, which given a ciphertext, detects if it’s been encrypted with ECB mode with CBC mode.
